title: Textile (India), 19th century
medium:
Medium: silk, seeds
Technique: ladder, buttonhole, surface and chain stitch embroidery on plain weave
description: Fragments of green, yellow and red silk pieced together and densely embroidered in a stylized design of geometric and floral motifs. Small tassels with seeds are attached to the sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile (India), 19th century. Medium: silk, seeds
Technique: ladder, buttonhole, surface and chain stitch embroidery on plain weave. 
1945-39-5-b
